item.title: The ChargePoint Home Flex EV Charger
item.description: This review is about the ChargePoint Home Flex EV charger. The link below is an affiliate link through which I would receive a commission if you purchase the product. ChargePoint Home Flex on Amazon We were an early adopter of the Chevrolet Bolt BEV, having owned one since its introductory year of 2017. In 2020 after our other car, one with a conventional engine, broke down, we went out and got another Bolt.
